programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Beauty Empire
programme.desc: is a glossy drama series about a rags-to-riches beauty entrepreneur who is out to take revenge on the people who have wronged her. She comes out as a new beauty industry player, tearing down the empire that her enemies have built. She goes head-to-head against a crass but social media famous beauty CEO who is mentored by her idol, a powerful industry veteran whose ties to her goes beyond business.
